mapper.select: select count(clientCode) as number, sum(order_pay_amount) as totalAmount, sum(amount) as amount, date_format( from_unixtime(create_time ), '%m-%d' ) as time from f_order where order_status != 2 and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{1} DAY) <= from_unixtime( order.create_time ) group by date_format( from_unixtime( order.create_time ),'%m-%d' )

select count(clientCode) as number, sum(order_pay_amount) as totalAmount, sum(amount) as amount, date_format( from_unixtime( order.end_time ), '%m-%d' ) as time from f_order where from_unixtime( order.end_time ) > #{stime} and from_unixtime( order.end_time ) < #{etime} group by date_format( from_unixtime( order.end_time ),'%m-%d' )
